trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its application directory.
trans-unit.target: 藉由測試組件的應用程式目錄，判斷它是否屬於程式碼群組。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition> determines whether an <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory><xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory.Directory%2A> property contains the assembly URL evidence path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition> 決定是否<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory><xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory.Directory%2A>屬性包含組件的 URL 辨識項路徑。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory> is C:\app1, assemblies with URL evidence such as C:\app1, C:\app1\main.aspx, C:\app1\folder1, or C:\app1\folder1\main1.aspx match this membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>C:\app1、 組件包含 URL 辨識項，例如 C:\app1、 C:\app1\main.aspx、 C:\app1\folder1，或是 C:\app1\folder1\main1.aspx 符合這個成員資格條件。

trans-unit.source: Code that is not in the C:\app1 directory or in one of its subdirectories fails this membership condition test.
trans-unit.target: 不在 C:\app1 目錄，或其子目錄中的程式碼此成員資格條件測試就會失敗。

trans-unit.source: Code without either <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> evidence always fails this membership condition test.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼，但沒有<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>或<xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>辨識項一律會在此成員資格條件測試失敗。

trans-unit.source: The membership condition is determined by the URL evidence for the application.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格條件取決於應用程式的 URL 辨識項。

trans-unit.source: You cannot configure the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition> object; it is predetermined by the location of the application.
trans-unit.target: 您無法設定<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition>物件; 它預定的應用程式的位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The membership condition tests whether the assembly URL evidence is a path within the directory specified by <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格條件測試組件的 URL 辨識項是所指定的目錄內的路徑是否<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>。

trans-unit.source: The evidence set against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: 要進行測試的辨識項集合。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the membership condition is satisfied by the specified evidence.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的辨識項是否滿足成員資格條件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的辨識項符合成員資格條件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `evidence` parameter must contain both <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory> evidence that specifies the application directory of the running application and <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> evidence that specifies the code base of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: `evidence`參數必須包含同時<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>，指定執行中應用程式的應用程式目錄辨識項和<xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>指定組件的程式碼基底的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The code base specified by the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> evidence must represent a path in the directory tree of the application directory specified by the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory> evidence for this method to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的程式碼基底<xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>辨識項必須代表所指定的應用程式目錄的目錄樹狀結構中的路徑<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory>辨識項，此方法才能傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 建立成員資格條件的相等複本。

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 目前成員資格條件的相同新複本。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition" /> 相比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified membership condition is an <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的成員資格條件是否為 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified membership condition is an <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的成員資格條件為 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectoryMembershipCondition" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用來重新建構安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is not a valid application directory membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數不是有效的應用程式目錄成員資格條件項目。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用來重新建構安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: The policy level context, used to resolve named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: 原則層級內容，用來解析具名的使用權限集合參考。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is not a valid application directory membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數不是有效的應用程式目錄成員資格條件項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前成員資格條件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 目前成員資格條件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回成員資格條件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the state of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格條件狀態的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全物件及其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全物件及其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全物件的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The policy level context for resolving named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: 原則層級內容，用來解析具名使用權限集合參考。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />，建立安全性物件的 XML 編碼方式和它的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全物件的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。
